# Publications

**First author**

```{r}
pubs %>% 
  dplyr::filter(first_author, !preprint) %>% 
  vitae::detailed_entries(
    what = title,
    when = year,
    with = author,
    where = journal, 
    .protect = TRUE)
```

**Non-first author**

```{r}
pubs %>%
  dplyr::filter(!first_author, !preprint) %>%
  vitae::detailed_entries(
    what = title,
    when = year,
    with = author,
    where = journal,
    .protect = TRUE
  )
```

**Preprints**

```{r}
pubs %>%
  dplyr::filter(preprint) %>%
  vitae::detailed_entries(
    what = title,
    when = year,
    with = author,
    where = journal,
    .protect = TRUE
  )
```
